itemDescription: British botanist and historian of science (1885-1962)

wikipedia_page.main: Hugh Hamshaw "Ham" Thomas, MBE, FRS, FLS, (29 May 1885 in Wrexham, Wales – 30 June 1962 in Cambridge, England), was a British paleobotanist.

response: *1960: Libbie H. Hyman and Hugh Hamshaw Thomas
